Main.TextJPN: 「ねぇ、教えてよ母さん。鬼婆とどういう喧嘩をしたわけ？@k@vS20/06/440600034.　勘当されるなんてよっぽどだったわけでしょ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, mom. Tell me. Why did you have a fight with the hag?@k@vS20/06/440600034. It was bad enough that she disowned you, right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「お前も下らないことに興味が尽きないね。……ま、そろそろ話してもわからない歳じゃないか。@k@vS20/16/442200002.実はね、父さんと結婚したいって言ったらね、駄目だって言われちゃったのよ」
Main.TextENG: ``You're so nosy about everything... Well, I guess you're old enough to know.@k@vS20/16/442200002. She objected when I told her I wanted to marry your father.``

Main.TextJPN: 「私も当時はだいぶ斜な生き方してて呆れられててね。その挙句、連れて来た男が任侠者だったわけでしょ。@k@|@y@vS20/16/442200004.そりゃ大喧嘩よ」
Main.TextENG: ``I was living a very unseemly life back then. Then the man I brought home was a yakuza,@k@|@y@vS20/16/442200004. so of course she got terribly upset.

Main.TextJPN: 「許婚は頭首が決める、なんて言われて、そんなの知ったこっかいこんのくそ婆ァ！　この場で斬り伏せたらあッて大立ち回りよ。@k@|@y@vS20/16/442200006.互いに板の間の日本刀抜いて、チャンチャンバラバラ。@k@|@y@vS20/16/442200007.あっはっはっは」
Main.TextENG: She said, 'the head of the family will choose your fiance,' and I said, 'screw your decisions, you fucking virago!' So then we both tried to cut each other down on the spot.@k@|@y@vS20/16/442200006. We unsheathed our katanas in the living room and clashed and slashed and sliced.@k@|@y@vS20/16/442200007. Aha ha ha ha!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ひぇー…！　鬼婆と殺陣を演じたわけ？！@k@vS20/06/440600037.　母さんやるねぇ…」
Main.TextENG: ``Eeek...! You fought that hag with a sword?!@k@vS20/06/440600037. Way to go, Mom...``

Main.TextJPN: 「まぁねー。母さん、こう見えても若い頃は武闘派だしー。@k@vS20/16/442200009.互いに剣道有段だからそりゃードハデだったわよ。@k@vS20/16/442200010.周りはオロオロ、あー面白かった」
Main.TextENG: ``Well, I was into martial arts when I was young.@k@vS20/16/442200009. Both she and I held high ranks in kendo, so yes, it was quite the show.@k@vS20/16/442200010. Everyone nearby was terrified. Ah, that was fun.``

Main.TextJPN: 「なるほどねぇ……。その騒ぎのせいで勘当されたわけ？」
Main.TextENG: ``I see...... so is that why you were disowned?``

Main.TextJPN: 「そうよ、勘当上等！　遠慮なく勘当もらって父さんと籍を入れたわよ。@k@vS20/16/442200012.まぁけじめってことで爪を剥がされたけどねー。@k@vS20/16/442200013.ほら、左手の爪だけ歪でしょ」
Main.TextENG: ``That's right. I was happy for it! I married your father right away.@k@vS20/16/442200012. Well, I was forced to remove my fingernails in atonement, though.@k@vS20/16/442200013. See how the fingernails of my left hand look ugly?``

Main.TextJPN: 「うわぁ……。それで鬼婆と母さんはずーっと仲が悪いわけだね…」
Main.TextENG: ``Wow... So, that's why you and the hag have a bad relationship, huh...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「あははは、詩音、本当はね？　そんなことないの。@k@vS20/16/442200015.私と鬼婆さまはちゃんと仲がいいんだよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Ahahaha, you know what, Shion? That's not actually true.@k@vS20/16/442200015. Our relationship is actually pretty good.``

Main.TextJPN: 「鬼婆さまには面倒な世間体があるからね。一度でも勘当した以上、甘くすると示しがつかないし。@k@vS20/16/442200017.だから私も親類会議とかでは大人しく引っ込んでるけど。@k@vS20/16/442200018.たまーに遊びに行ってのんびりお茶とか飲んでるよ」
Main.TextENG: ``She has to maintain the family's reputation, so she can't treat me normally,@k@vS20/16/442200017. and accordingly, I lay low at the family councils.@k@vS20/16/442200018. But I visit her every now and then, and we have tea together.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うそだーーーー、信じらんないねぇ…！」
「実はね、内緒よ？　鬼婆さまもね、その昔、けじめで爪を剥いだことあるんだってよー？@k@vS20/16/442200020.　今度、会ったら左手の爪をよく見てごらん」
Main.TextENG: ``This is just between you and me, okay? She removed her fingernails in atonement a long time ago herself.@k@vS20/16/442200020. Look carefully at her hand the next time you see her.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ひぇー……！　鬼婆は何をやったわけ？」
「さーーーーねーーーーー！　母さんは知ぃらない☆」
Main.TextENG: ``Beats me! I don't have a clue☆!``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、その顔は知ってるなぁ？！　教えてよー！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, you do so have one! It's all over your face! Tell meee!``
